title: What Are The Implications of 'Apple Pay'?
teaser: Apple says its new mobile payment system would be more secure than credit card transactions, but questions about security persist.
contentencoded:
Yesterday in Cupertino, Apple introduced the world to the iPhone 6, the new Apple Watch, and a mobile payment system called Apple Pay.

Apple says the system would be more secure than credit card transactions, but questions about security persist.

Maggie Lake, a business reporter for CNN joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to look at security questions and also what the new payment system means for credit card companies.

Guest

  • Maggie Lake, business reporter for CNN. She tweets @maggielake.
